exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment u, v : nat -> R r : R eps : posreal H1 : forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n N, n : nat Hn1 : (N <= n)%nat Hn2 : r - eps < u n N0 : nat H : forall n : nat, (N0 <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps H0 : forall eps : posreal, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps H2 : forall (eps : posreal) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n x : nat H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Unable to unify "r - eps < u n" with "r - eps < v n".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment u, v : nat -> R r : R eps : posreal H1 : forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n N : nat H3 : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps n : nat Hn : (N <= n)%nat H : forall eps : posreal, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < r + eps H0 : forall (eps : posreal) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ r - eps < u n x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Unable to unify "u n < r + eps" with "v n < r + eps".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment u, v : nat -> R Hu : forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\\ M < u n M : R N, n : nat Hn : (N <= n)%nat Hlt : M < u n x : nat H : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Unable to unify "M < u n" with "M < v n".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment u, v : nat -> R Hu : forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < M M : R N : nat H4 : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < M n : nat Hn : (N <= n)%nat x : nat H : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n = v n Unable to unify "u n < M" with "v n < M".

original: intros Heq Hu. unfold is_LimSup_seq in *. destruct l. - intros eps. destruct (Hu eps) as [H1 H2]. split. + intro N. destruct (H1 N) as [n [Hn1 Hn2]]. exists n. split. * apply Hn1. * rewrite <- Heq. apply Hn2. + destruct H2 as [N H3]. exists N. intros n Hn. rewrite <- Heq. apply (H3 n Hn). - intros M N. destruct (Hu M N) as [n [Hn Hlt]]. exists n. split. + apply Hn. + rewrite <- Heq. apply Hlt. - intros M. destruct (Hu M) as [N H4]. exists N. intros n Hn. rewrite <- Heq. apply (H4 n Hn).
